description: In Windows Vista and Windows 7, S2MV files can be found in the subdirectories of the following directory: [user]\​AppData\​Local\​Blizzard Entertainment\​Battle.net\​Cache\​
In Mac OS X, they can be found in the subdirectories of this directory: [user]/​Shared/​Blizzard/​Battle.net/​Cache/​
NOTE: You can open S2MV files with an image viewing application by changing the ".s2mv" extension to ".tga," ".jpg," or ".png," and then opening the resulting file.
